Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label a fish in its water habitat.
The student can include and label other plants and animals that might live in the same water habitat.
The student can illustrate and label resources the fish needs to survive, like water and food.
The student can show and label how the fish uses its habitat to meet its needs, such as swimming in water.
The student can connect the parts of the habitat as a system, showing how the fish, plants, animals, and resources work together.
